# Nith (ward)

|elects_howmany=4
|councillor1=John Campbell
|party1=Scottish National Party
|councillor2=Malcolm Johnstone
|party2=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|councillor3=Keith Walters
|party3=Scottish Labour Party
|councillor4=David R. Slater
|party4=Independent (politician)
|towns=Dumfries (part of)

|scot_region=South Scotland
|westminster=Dumfries and Galloway

Nith is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Dumfries and Galloway Council. It elects four Councillors.
